== Fields

=== `value`

The interpolated string to group based on.
This field supports xref:configuration:interpolation.adoc#bloblang-queries[interpolation functions].

*Type*: `string`

[source,yaml]
----
# Examples:
value: ${! meta("kafka_key") }
value: ${! json("foo.bar") }-${! meta("baz") }

----
